faqs.q: How many calories in a Granny Smith apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for one medium-sized apple.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in a Granny Smith apple?
faqs.a: Roughly 4.4 g of dietary fiber per medium apple, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Are Granny Smith apples low in sugar compared to other varieties?
faqs.a: They have about 19 g sugars per medium apple, lower than sweeter types like Fuji.
